about_the_game:
The planet of slimes was quiet until the dusters came here. Aliens from outer space, they turned blooming fields into a desert, gentle winds into sandstorms, and plants into dust. Gather the slimes and lead them into battle against the invaders. It is up to you to make this planet bloom again!

Key features:


  • Build slime squads using factories and send them into battle
  • Collect the gel of fallen slimes and reuse it
  • Improve your own factories and slimes between attacks
  • Research new upgrades between battles
  • Each type of slime is special, plan a wise strategy to overcome the enemy
